Description of incident: It has been reported that Medtronic, the world's largest medical device maker's computer network  has been hacked sometime in the first half of 2013. It is not clear what type of information the hackers were targeting. Federal laws meant to safeguard medical information require companies to disclose any breach involving patient information, so far Medtronics has not made these disclosures.The attacks point to Chinese hackers and the medical device company was not aware of the intrusions until federal authorities contacted them and they have now formed a task force to investigate the breach. A spokewoman for the medical device maker would not comment on any specific attacks.
